title: Private Amazon API Gateway REST API to be invoked from an AWS Lambda function in a different AWS Region
description: This sample project demonstrates how to invoke a Private Amazon API Gateway REST API from a different AWS Region.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern implements a cross-region private Amazon API Gateway REST API using an Interface VPC Endpoint and VPC peering.
See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.

authors.name: Luigi Napoleone Capasso
authors.bio: Luigi Napoleone Capasso is a Technical Account Manager at Amazon Web Services.
